description: Post-fetch cleanup - Fields to remove from API responses at different pipeline stages to reduce data size and remove unnecessary metadata

usage.postfetch_stage: Use 'common_exclude_keys' + 'additional_exclude_keys_for_detail_api' when fetching individual model details after post-fetch filtering

rationale.spaces: Not needed - reference to spaces using this model
rationale.siblings: Not needed - list of related model files
rationale.widgetData: Not needed - UI widget configuration data
rationale.likes: Not needed - social metric, not operational
rationale.trendingScore: Not needed - social metric, not operational
rationale.downloads: Not needed - social metric, not operational
rationale.createdAt: Not needed - creation timestamp, not operational
rationale.lastModified: Not needed - modification timestamp, not operational
rationale.private: Not needed - already filtered by gated=false
